email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a client looking to move 100,000 MT of crude oil from Rotterdam to Singapore. The laycan is 15-20 October. Could you provide a freight quote for this? Looking forward to your response. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Thanks for reaching out. For 100,000 MT of crude oil from Rotterdam to Singapore, I can offer a rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per MT. Let me know if this works for your client. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thanks for the quick response. My client is considering your offer but is looking for a rate closer to $50.00 per MT. Would you be able to adjust your quote? Also, could you confirm the vessel details? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, I can come down to $50.25 per MT, but that’s the best I can do. The vessel I have in mind is the MV Ocean Star, DWT 120,000, LOA 250m. She’s currently in the North Sea and can meet the laycan. Let me know if this works. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thanks for the update. My client has agreed to $50.25 per MT. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star. Could you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Great news. Laytime will be 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, Perfect. We’ll review the charter party agreement and get back to you by end of day. Thanks for your flexibility on the rate. Best, Sarah
